```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(mdthemes)

```


```{r}

mydata <- read_csv('/Users/ryan/Google Drive/2020_2021/Thesis/Figures/Figure8/polling_frequency.csv',
                   col_type = cols(year = col_double(),
                                   polls = col_double())) %>%
  drop_na()

mydata %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = polls)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() + 
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(
    title = "Polls Rising",
    subtitle = "Tracking the the number of national-level polls employing \nlive interviewers every election year from 1952 to 2016.",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Count",
    caption = expression(paste("Source: ", italic("The Timeline of Presidential Elections")))
    ) + 
  ggsave("polling_frequency.bmp", width = 7.5, height = 4.5)
```
